message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product at a special price of $180. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. However, $140 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $160. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit short of my target. Would you be willing to consider $145?
I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to make another slight concession. I'll meet you at $155. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. Would you be willing to meet me at $150?
